summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AdOperator decision engine. Backend APIs working correctly with minor auth status code issue. Frontend functioning well with all required features - login, dashboard, product form with all 7 required fields. One minor UI issue with dropdown selection resolved via keyboard navigation.

minor_bugs.issue: Return 403 instead of 401 when no auth provided
minor_bugs.impact: Does not affect functionality - auth is working correctly

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown option 'Persuasivo' not clickable via mouse - needs keyboard navigation

passed_tests: GET /api/auth/me - returns user info with valid token
POST /api/analyses - creates analysis with product data
Frontend redirects to /login when not authenticated
Frontend new analysis form loads at /analysis/new
All 7 required product form fields present with data-testids
Form validation and submit button functionality

success_percentage.backend: 90% - All core APIs working, minor auth status code issue
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All features working, minor dropdown UI issue

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fixes: 1) Update protected endpoints to return 401 instead of 403 for unauthorized requests, 2) Fix Select dropdown component to allow mouse clicks on options
